amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to employ workers described in section 274A(h)(3) of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the hiring of illegal aliens.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. King (IA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
